body_html: Hi @Dorimer, this is great! I know you have tested this fix visually, but I am wondering if there isn't a automatic test we can add to the test suite to prevent this from regressing if someone ever reimplements this kernel. Perhaps doing the allclose computation on the two differently sized inputs?

body: Hi @Dorimer, this is great! I know you have tested this fix visually, but I am wondering if there isn't a automatic test we can add to the test suite to prevent this from regressing if someone ever reimplements this kernel. Perhaps doing the allclose computation on the two differently sized inputs?
